survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer attitudes and behaviors towards sustainable fashion, including purchasing habits, brand preferences, and barriers to adoption.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase sustainable fashion items (e.g., organic cotton, recycled materials, fair trade)?
answer_options: Very frequently (at least once a month)
questions.client_notes: Ensure the options cover a broad range of frequencies to capture varied purchasing behaviors.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase sustainable fashion items (e.g., organic cotton, recycled materials, fair trade)?
answer_options: Very frequently (at least once a month)

questions.question_text: What factors influence your decision to purchase sustainable fashion? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse motivations.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes); include an 'Other' option with open-text entry.

script.question_text: What factors influence your decision to purchase sustainable fashion? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please specify any other factors influencing your sustainable fashion purchases.
questions.client_notes: Provide a concise open-text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text (text input box); display only if 'Other' is selected in Q2.

script.question_text: Please specify any other factors influencing your sustainable fashion purchases.

questions.question_text: How important is sustainability when making fashion purchases, compared to other factors?
answer_options: Moderately important (considered but not a priority)
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced Likert scale to measure perceived importance.

script.question_text: How important is sustainability when making fashion purchases, compared to other factors?
answer_options: Moderately important (considered but not a priority)

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable fashion brands are you familiar with? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include a mix of well-known and niche brands to gauge awareness.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable fashion brands are you familiar with? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from purchasing sustainable fashion more often? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: No barriers—I already purchase sustainable fashion
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use this to identify key obstacles for improvement.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes); include an 'Other' option with open-text entry.
